title: ふわふわ、キラキラ、あこがれは

text_block_list.text: One day, while training stoically for the 'Japan Cup', a letter arrives for Matikanetannhauser from a round-glasses-wearing reporter.
The letter said she had been encouraged many times. If Matikanetannhauser were a special girl, she wouldn't have been encouraged this much.
So it expressed gratitude, saying that's why you are my 'protagonist'. From that letter, she understood the meaning of Yayoi Akikawa's words, 'Because it's you, I can push you forward'—
She understands the meaning of those words. If she can become a 'protagonist', she wants to be one. If possible, she wants to be a 'protagonist' for even more people!
That new dream strongly drives her forward. At the press conference, she declares she will become the 'protagonist' in the 'Japan Cup', and great expectations are placed on her!
